casebody.data:
McGLADREY & PULLEN
v.
BOARD OF CPA Ex. No. 469A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 13, 2006. Jack L. Cozort, Kristin R. Poolos, Charlotte, for McGladry & Pullen. Noel L. Allen, M. Jackson Nichols, Raleigh, for Board of CPA Examiners.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of February 2006 by Plaintiff for Leave to File Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 13th day of February 2006."
